sentences.en: A careless driver is a danger to the public.
sentences.cn: 粗心的驾驶员对于公众是一种危险.

sentences.en: a careless mistake
sentences.cn: 粗心造成的错误

sentences.en: A careless mistake cost the company millions of dollars.
sentences.cn: 一次疏忽造成了公司数百万美元的损失.

sentences.en: careless driving
sentences.cn: 粗心驾驶

sentences.en: Careless talk can be disastrous for a business.
sentences.cn: 谈话不慎有时会给企业带来灾难性的损失。

sentences.en: Careless use of the clutch may damage the gears.
sentences.cn: 离合器使用不慎可能会损坏传动装置。

sentences.en: He is severely put down for his careless work.
sentences.cn: 他因工作上的粗心大意而受到了严厉的批评.

sentences.en: He was dismissed from the service for his careless behaviours.
sentences.cn: 他因玩忽职守而被革除(职务).

sentences.en: I saw that I had been guilty of a careless blunder.
sentences.cn: 我意识到自己因疏忽而酿成大错.

sentences.en: I'm sorry. How careless of me.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我太不小心了。

sentences.en: If you were the least bit careless, you could fall right in.
sentences.cn: 你稍不警觉, 就会失足.

sentences.en: It was careless of him to leave the door unlocked.
sentences.cn: 他忘了锁门，真是粗心大意。

sentences.en: It was careless of me to leave the door open.
sentences.cn: 怪我粗心忘了关门。

sentences.en: She gave a careless shrug.
sentences.cn: 她漠然地耸了耸肩。

sentences.en: She's careless about her hygiene.
sentences.cn: 她不注意个人卫生。

sentences.en: Some mothers were a bit careless with money.
sentences.cn: 有些当妈妈的花钱有点随意。

sentences.en: That shows a fairly careless attitude to clothes, doesn't it?
sentences.cn: 那表明此人不讲究穿着，是吧？

sentences.en: The boss gave him the push due to his careless work.
sentences.cn: 由于他工作不细心,老板解雇了他.

sentences.en: They could not afford to spoil those maps by careless colouring.
sentences.cn: 若是上色的时候不小心弄坏了那些地图，他们可承担不起。

sentences.en: To be crude and careless is an extremely bad style of work.
sentences.cn: 粗枝大叶是一种极坏的作风.

words.tran_cn: 有同情心的；表示或感到关怀或关心的
粗心地；不注意地；无忧无虑地

phrases.tran_cn: 不顾；不关心；不在乎；不感兴趣；无忧无虑

trans.tran_cn: 粗心大意的，不在意的，随意的，不关心的，漫不经心的
trans.tran_en: not paying enough attention to what you are doing, so that you make mistakes, damage things etc
